item.title: Third Person Hitscan Firing Systems
item.description: Honestly, I was a bit surprised when I embarked on creating a third person shooter how little literature there is on how to properly implement a third person hitscan firing weapon aside from working through an entire course. However, I think the general idea of it is really easy and geometrically satisfying. Let’s jump right into it. C++ or Blueprints? Either way, it really doesn’t matter. I’m going to be explaining the theory behind how this works so you can implement it in any system.
